titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation which authorizes the vessel SUVA to engage in the coastwise trade.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Referred to Subcommittee on Merchant Marine.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received From DOT.

bill.summary: 6/14/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel for employment in the coastwise trade.
